attributes.review: I have never been so disrespected by an app in my life. When you first go into the app it talks about how Donald Trump is planning to build a wall. That is all i could get to without throwing up by breakfast, lunch, and, dinner😱😡😡. if you stand for Donald Trump then i can’t respect you. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. 🤢🤮😷🤐😬
attributes.title: Worst app on the app store

attributes.review: Worst app too support an even worse president who is sexist, racist, and homophobic. Who doesn’t even deserve to be president. Who can’t see the wrong he is doing. Sooner or later it will come back to haunt him. And gen Z will be ready to fix everything he has wronged
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I just downloaded this app out of curiosity. First off, it took like 5 years just to download. Then when you are signing up for the app, they hide the teemed and services which is super sketchy. Don’t even wast your Tim with this app. It is Garbage🤮🤮🤢🤢🤮🤮Worst app ever.
attributes.title: Probably the worst app ever

attributes.review: I was a trump supporter 😤🇺🇸but after downloading this app it kept giving me links to porn sites 🤢and as a christian that was so inappropriate! My phone then started glitching as if it had a virus and funny how the president cant even avoid TWO viruses 😔smh i am very disappointed in our orange king.
attributes.title: Dump trump 😌✨

attributes.review:
Soon as I signed up and put my email in I got about 20 EMAILS a DAY. Not only that this app is so glitchy and slow, and the ads that are on that app are made to give you a VIRUS. This whole app is a scam. And one more thing 

arrest the cops that killed breonna Taylor.
attributes.title: Don’t download this app

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch like crazy, my screen would completely turn black everytime I tried to yse and it took hours to download and was not helpful at all.
attributes.title: Extremely Disappointed

attributes.review: This app was the worst it took too long til download and it makes my phone glitch a lot so I don’t think other people could like it could you please take it out the App Store it’s very bad it wastes my whole battery and it glitches
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review:
There is horrible quality and it took too long to download. My phone crashes everytime I open the app and it glitches too much 😶✌️
Work on the quality of this app, it’s horrible. Hope trump grows some hair soon 🤡
attributes.title: Trash 🗑

attributes.review: I was hoping to learn more about our pres but this made my views worse and it also messed with my phone and it wouldn’t let me use it for awhile and my phone got really over heated!!! This app is terrible and I hope they remove it
attributes.title: Worst ever

attributes.review: i downloaded the app and it started giving me problems with my phone . Yes i tired turning it off and on again still didn’t work . This app will give your phone bugs and it will make it glitch a lot TAKE MY WORD !
attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN
